id.description: Profit-class New Trader (MJ 141 & 238). Avatar looks like someone hated by Mr. Dinkley (Junior's dad).

phase.events: Created by Deadelus on Kallistan | Failed Prototype: Faster planing engine didn't work | Expected to abide by the Asimov protocols, but is secretly not bound by them in fact

character.notes: High Concept: Failed Prototype? More specific phrasing? The USS Defiant NX-74205 might be "Overpowered Cannons With a Warp Drive Strapped On the Back" Trouble: Non-Asimovian Abomination? Somebody Wants Me Back? Secretly Has Free Will? Questions: An attempt at a faster planing engine was not successful. What sort of ship were you intended to be? What part of that failed, and what parts were still successful? Also non-Asimovian. By mistake or design? Who knows this? What is your name? Are there other ships with a similar or identical design? Are you an "Alpha Quadrant Jem'Hadar" with a rivalry with your predecessors? Or are you the old deprecated model? Are you a cargo ship? A sporty little VIP passenger yacht? An infiltrator? A "family sedan"? Do you have a gender? What pronouns do people use for you? Do you have an Avatar? When people see you, do they say "That's a one-of-a-kind ship", "What is that?", or "There's another XYZ"?
